title: Ryan Reynolds & John Krasinski Unite for Comedy 'Imaginary Friends' | THR News
text: Sarah: Our U.S. military officials are angry, they personally know the Kurds they have been fighting alongside. They consider them friends and even, in some cases, brothers in arms. While the Kurds may not have been with the Americans in Normandy, as Trump curiously noted on Wednesday, neither were the U.S. service members who are now in Iraq and Syria. What those service members know, military officials say, is that the Kurds have been with them in Manbij, and Raqqa, and the Middle Euphrates River Valley.
description: Ryan Reynolds and John Krasinski team up for the fantasy comedy, 'Imaginary Friends.'
